alert.note: Alert for Morongo Basin (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LasVegas (Southern Nevada, Southeastern California, Northwestern Arizona)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued January 03 at 12:02PM PST until January 04 at 10:00AM PST by NWS LasVegas
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 4 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 10 AM PST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Northwest winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 45 mph expected. * WHERE...Morongo Basin including Morongo Valley, Joshua Tree, and Twentynine Palms. * WHEN...From 4 PM this afternoon to 10 AM PST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds will blow around unsecured objects and could damage structures susceptible to wind. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result.
info.instruction: Winds this strong can make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Use extra caution.
